name: Domino House [Demo]
description:
Domino House: A point-and-click puzzle game. Solve puzzles involving domino pieces, hidden objects, and item use to escape the strange Domino House.

This is version Beta 1 of the Demo.  It's like a vertical slice as there are some puzzles and items that you won't be able to use as they are intended for rooms that are not there yet.
However, there is a reachable goal to get to the end of the demo.

Credits
Programming by lilou_cormic
Design and art by Hamsterspit
Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) CC-By 4.0

Controls
Left-click on objects to interact
Right-click on objects to get a description Drag/drop items from the inventory to use them

Note: Each puzzle has visual clues. However, sound cues are also present.
